common.content: Please use the verification code below to complete your action. If you did not request this, please ignore this email
common.disclaimer: For security, never share this code. We will never ask you for this code

default.subject: Shopsifu Account Security Alert
default.title: Security Alert
default.mainMessage: A security-related activity occurred on your account

PASSWORD_CHANGED.subject: Alert: Your Password Has Been Changed
PASSWORD_CHANGED.title: Your Password Has Been Changed
PASSWORD_CHANGED.mainMessage: This is a confirmation that the password for your Shopsifu account has been successfully changed
PASSWORD_CHANGED.secondaryMessage: If you did not make this change, please contact our support team immediately

NEW_DEVICE_LOGIN.subject: Alert: New Device Login Detected
NEW_DEVICE_LOGIN.title: New Device Login Detected
NEW_DEVICE_LOGIN.mainMessage: Your account was accessed from a new device or location
NEW_DEVICE_LOGIN.secondaryMessage: If this was not you, please change your password and review recent login activity

DEVICE_TRUSTED.subject: Notification: New Device Trusted
DEVICE_TRUSTED.title: New Device Trusted
DEVICE_TRUSTED.mainMessage: This device will not require additional verification for future logins
DEVICE_TRUSTED.secondaryMessage: If you do not recognize this action, please review your device list

DEVICE_UNTRUSTED.subject: Notification: Device Untrusted
DEVICE_UNTRUSTED.title: Device Untrusted
DEVICE_UNTRUSTED.mainMessage: This device will require additional verification on its next login
DEVICE_UNTRUSTED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please review your device list

TWO_FACTOR_ENABLED.subject: Account Security Enhanced
TWO_FACTOR_ENABLED.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Enabled
TWO_FACTOR_ENABLED.mainMessage: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled for your account. You will now need to provide a verification code when logging in
TWO_FACTOR_ENABLED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please contact us immediately

TWO_FACTOR_DISABLED.subject: Alert: Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
TWO_FACTOR_DISABLED.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Disabled
TWO_FACTOR_DISABLED.mainMessage: Two-factor authentication has been disabled on your account. Your account is now protected only by your password
TWO_FACTOR_DISABLED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please re-enable 2FA and contact support immediately

SESSIONS_REVOKED.subject: Notification: Login Sessions Revoked
SESSIONS_REVOKED.title: Login Sessions Revoked
SESSIONS_REVOKED.mainMessage: One or more login sessions have been revoked. Affected devices will need to log in again
SESSIONS_REVOKED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please change your password and check account activity

ACCOUNT_LOCKED.subject: Alert: Your Account Has Been Locked
ACCOUNT_LOCKED.title: Your Account Has Been Temporarily Locked
ACCOUNT_LOCKED.mainMessage: We detected too many failed login attempts and have temporarily locked your account for security
ACCOUNT_LOCKED.secondaryMessage: Please wait {lockoutMinutes} minutes before trying again or reset your password if you've forgotten it

SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY.subject: Alert: Suspicious Activity Detected
SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY.title: Suspicious Activity Detected
SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY.mainMessage: Our system detected unusual activity related to your account
SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY.secondaryMessage: For security, we recommend reviewing recent activity and changing your password if needed

ACCOUNT_LINKED.subject: Notification: Account Linked
ACCOUNT_LINKED.title: Account Linked Successfully
ACCOUNT_LINKED.mainMessage: Your {provider} account has been successfully linked to your Shopsifu account
ACCOUNT_LINKED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please contact our support team immediately

ACCOUNT_UNLINKED.subject: Notification: Account Unlinked
ACCOUNT_UNLINKED.title: Account Unlinked Successfully
ACCOUNT_UNLINKED.mainMessage: Your {provider} account has been successfully unlinked from your Shopsifu account
ACCOUNT_UNLINKED.secondaryMessage: If you did not perform this action, please contact our support team immediately

DEVICE_LIMIT_WARNING.subject: Alert: Approaching Device Limit
DEVICE_LIMIT_WARNING.title: Device Limit Warning
DEVICE_LIMIT_WARNING.mainMessage: You are approaching the maximum number of devices linked to your account. Please review and manage your devices
DEVICE_LIMIT_WARNING.secondaryMessage: If you reach the limit, you will not be able to log in on a new device until you remove some existing ones

welcome.subject: Welcome to Shopsifu!
welcome.headline: Welcome to Shopsifu!
welcome.content: Thank you for signing up. We're thrilled to have you here. Start exploring our amazing features now

recoveryCodes.subject: Your 2FA Recovery Codes
recoveryCodes.headline: Store Your Recovery Codes
recoveryCodes.content: These are your recovery codes for your account. Please store them in a safe place. You can use these codes to access your account if you lose access to your authentication device
recoveryCodes.warning: Each code can only be used once. Do not share these codes with anyone
